SEARCH
Package com.root14.barcodeservice.config

Class IndustrialWriterProvider

java.lang.Object
com.root14.barcodeservice.config.IndustrialWriterProvider
@Configuration public class IndustrialWriterProvider extends Object
This class provides Spring Bean definitions for industrial 1D barcode writers. It offers Code39Writer, Code93Writer, Code128Writer, CodaBarWriter, and ITFWriter from the Google ZXing library as injectable components within a Spring application. Each writer bean is initialized lazily, meaning it will only be created when it is first needed.

  • Method Details

    • provideCode39Writer

      @Bean @Lazy public com.google.zxing.oned.Code39Writer provideCode39Writer()
      Provides an instance of Code39Writer. This writer is used for generating Code 39 barcodes.
      Returns:
      A new instance of Code39Writer.

    • provideCode93Writer

      @Bean @Lazy public com.google.zxing.oned.Code93Writer provideCode93Writer()
      Provides an instance of Code93Writer. This writer is used for generating Code 93 barcodes.
      Returns:
      A new instance of Code93Writer.

    • provideITFWriter

      @Bean @Lazy public com.google.zxing.oned.ITFWriter provideITFWriter()
      Provides an instance of ITFWriter. This writer is used for generating ITF (Interleaved 2 of 5) barcodes.
      Returns:
      A new instance of ITFWriter.
